src:
Ilić debitovao porazom kao selektor
05 Nov 2019, 20:21 by Darko
Saša Ilić je porazom debitovao na selektorskoj funkciji.
Mlađa kadetska reprezentacija Srbije (U16) koju je odnedavno preuzeo Ilić, poražena je u prijateljskom meču od Slovačke – 1:2(1:0).
„Orlići“ su odlično ušli u meč i već posle nekoliko minuta poveli golom Mihajla Milosavića. U većem delu susreta Srbija je bila bolji rival, a u nastavku utakmice oba selektora izvršila su nekoliko izmena. I kada se činilo da će Srbija možda i dobiti ovaj meč, usledio je pad koncentracije i dva gola domaćina u samom finišu meča.
Izjednačio je Javorček u 74. minutu, a gol odluke postigao je Zahradnik, šest minuta kasnije.

POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
Ilic made his debut in defeat as a coach
05 Nov 2019, 19:21 by Darko
With his defeat, Sasa Ilic made his debut in the selection function.
Serbia's junior cadet national team (U16), recently taken over by Ilic, was defeated in a friendly match by Slovakia - 1: 2 (1: 0).
The "Eagles" went into the match great and after a few minutes led the goal of Mihail Milosavic. For the most part of the match Serbia was a better rival, and in the continuation of the match both selectors made several changes. And when it seemed that Serbia might even win this match, there was a fall in concentration and two goals from the hosts at the very end of the match.
Javorček equalized in the 74th minute, and the goal was scored by Zahradnik, six minutes later.
